Comments.Message: Same thing to me, nothing happened while the page showed "downloading..."

Hello

Thanks for reporting this issue.  It's a known issue of CodePlex that impacts users who use IE to download the clickonce app.  The CodePlex team is trying to fix the problem this week.  The current workaround is to use Chrome or FireFox to install the Sample Browser.  Here is a blog article with more details.  
http://blogs.msdn.com/b/codefx/archive/2012/05/27/issue-report-sample-browser-clickonce-installation-is-not-started-in-ie.aspx

Thanks
Jialiang Ge
Program Manager
Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework

The workaround did not work with Firefox 12.0 (using Win 7 x64) either. 

But the download worked fine with Chrome. Thanks for this hint!

I accidentally found a way to update without Web Browser. Yesterday I needed to seach samples. When I launched previous edition of Framework it prompted me about new version. I accepted updating new version and it succeeded. Thanks for your efforts. 

P.S. It is not the official way to ask for samples, but there's already no samples available for VB 2010 and DirectX. More Microsoft's DirectX SDK doesn't provide VB Samples at all.
